name: Taskade
long_description:
Taskade is the execution layer for ideas. One prompt becomes a live app that thinks and collaborates with your team. Build live dashboards, websites, and tools that connect with your workspace in real time.

Every workflow automates itself.
Every project becomes a live database.
Every agent plans, acts, and learns inside your workspace.

No code. No setup. Just creation.

Taskade Genesis turns work into living systems.
Projects remember. Agents learn. Automations keep everything in motion.
Build once, and your workspace evolves as your data and team grow.

Your workspace is the backend. The interface builds itself.
Software should be built by everyone.
Build without permission.

https://www.taskade.com
one_liner: One prompt. One app. One living workspace for teams.
